CustomField.description: Ticked when an Contact's Ownership fields are misaligned. Used as trigger for Scheduled Flow.
CustomField.formula: OR( TEXT(Corporate_Type__c) != TEXT(Owner.Corporate_Type__c), TEXT(Owner_Region__c) != TEXT(Owner.Region__c), TEXT(Owner_Business_Unit__c) != TEXT(Owner.Business_Unit__c), Creator_Country__c != CreatedBy.Country )
CustomField.label: System: Misaligned Owner Fields
